## Background

*Though the term "U/ulk" exists in several languages, for example being a "joke" in [German](/wiktionaryUlk/) or the name of other species of animals in Danish and Dutch, the Albanian "[ulk](/wiktionaryUlk/)" stands for [wolf](/wolves/).
